author: Hayley Minn
title: Broadchurch viewers in uproar at David Tennant's character and his shocking tea-making skills
text:
Get celebs     
Broadchurch viewers were in uproar over the latest episode of the hit ITV drama. 
However, their anger had nothing to do with the storyline - which sees Detective Sergeant Ellie Miller and Detective Inspector Alec Hardy investigating into the rape of Trish Winterman. 
It was actually about how Alec - played by David Tennant - made his cup of tea! 
As he and Ellie - played by Olivia Colman - headed back to the office, he decided to make a hot beverage. Read More Broadchurch viewers weren't impressed with David Tennant's character (Photo: ITV/Broadchurch) 
Everything sounding normal right now? 
Well, prepare to be shocked when you hear he used the microwave to heat up his drink! 
While Alec thought nothing of it, Ellie's repulsion was evident when she asked: "Are you really going to drink that disgusting stewed tea?" 
But she wasn't the only one to have her concerns for his taste buds, as viewers took to Twitter in their droves to blast his tea-making skills. Read More He made tea in the microwave (Photo: ITV/Broadchurch) 
One said: "I've never seen a cup of tea made so badly in my life, David Tennant." 
Another added: "Not sure about microwaving tea surely it'd taste minging." 
And a third agreed: "Right abuse of a cup of tea there! #Broadchurch Microwave, dodgy milk then a wooden spoon. Broadchurch making a cuppa look dodgy!" 
*Broadchurch continues on ITV1, Mondays at 9pm. Like us on Facebook
